ComicInfo.Series: DCeased: War of the Undead Gods
ComicInfo.Summary: After the destruction of Bolovax Vik, the Green Lanterns fall to Mxyzptlk, leaving the Spectre to face the undead imp. Meanwhile on Earth-2, the undead New Gods led by Highfather attack the surviving heroes.
